content: अवकॄ {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bestow, pour upon, to shower upon, cover with, fill; <ls>Śi. 11. 62</ls>; (तं) अवाकिरन् बाललताः प्रसूनैः <ls>R. 2. 10</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 27</ls>; लाजांजलिभिरवकीर्यमाणः <ls>K. 86</ls>; <ls>Ki. 6. 2</ls>; अवकीर्योत्तरीयाणि <ls>Mb.</ls> spreading on the ground; तीर्थानि अवकीर्णानि तपस्विभिः <ls>Mb.</ls> filled with; <ls>Y. 3. 281</ls>; <ls>Me. 54.</ls> {@--2@} To pour out, throw out <ls>Ms. 6. 48.</ls> {@--3@} To shake off, throw off, leave. {@--4@} (<ab>Atm.</ab>) (Used reflexively) ({%a%}) To extend, spread itself; अवकिरते हस्ती स्वयमेव <ls>Sk.</ls> ({%b%}) To fall asunder. ({%c%}) To pass away, fall off. ({%d%}) To become faithless or untrue.
